Rooms.Description: There are many merchants, wanderers and passerbys going about their business in the Town Square. You also see Griznak's Armor Shop and the Academy of Combat and Wizardry.
Rooms.Name: Town

Rooms.Description: You are in Griznak's Armor Shop. Here you can buy or sell weapons, armor, or other miscellaneous goods. You can also return to town.
Rooms.Name: Griznak's Armor Shop

Rooms.Description: You are in the Academy of Combat and Wizardry. Here you can learn new abilities and spells. You can also return to town.
Rooms.Name: Academy

Rooms.Description: The entrance to the goblin lair is a giant broken wooden door that has been half piled up with large stones. This used to be a garrison for human soldiers, but now serves as a shelter for vile creatures.
Rooms.Name: Entrance

Rooms.Description: You are in a dark hallway lit only by a few torches that are almost fully burned. There are a few rotting bones lying around, likely meals from a recent goblin supper. This hallway continues east.
Rooms.Name: Dimly Lit Hall

Rooms.Description: The east end of the hallway is even darker than the west end. A doorway in front of you is collapsed by large rocks. You can hear loud clangs and noises down a skinny corridor to the south.
Rooms.Name: Dimly Lit Hall

Rooms.Description: This corridor is just wide enough for a human to fit through, however many goblins could manage this easily. There is a large set of double doors at the end, guarded by a pair of rusty soldier statues wielding broken spears.
Rooms.Name: Corridor

Rooms.Description: Lying in the middle of the room is an old torn up carpet that was probably once red. It leads up to a copper Throne that has many empty jewel sockets and that is much too large for a goblin. You also see a set of stairs leading up.
Rooms.Name: Throne Room

Rooms.Description: You have left the goblin lair and return to town
Rooms.Name: Exit

Rooms.Description: A merchant in town has told you of a rumor that there is an ancient artifact of great value in a nearby graveyard. You travel there, and search thoroughly but find nothing except for a crypt that leads underground. It is said to contain the tomb of a fallen king from long ago.
Rooms.Name: Entrance

Rooms.Description: Inside the crypt is a large stairway that leads down. It is dark, but you have brought torches to guide your path. You fight through many spiderwebs. This place must have gone undisturbed for some time.
Rooms.Name: Crypt Stairs

Rooms.Description: At the bottom of the stairs lies a main chamber that connects multiple rooms, one to the east, one to the west, and one south. It is cold down here, very cold.
Rooms.Name: Main Chamber

Rooms.Description: In the west chamber of the crypt, the walls are lined with wooden compartments. Each one with a plaque above it to help remember the dead. The main chamber is east, and another room to the west.
Rooms.Name: West Chamber

Rooms.Description: In the east chamber of the crypt, the walls are lined with wooden compartments. Each one with a plaque above it to help remember the dead. The main chamber is west, and another room to the east.
Rooms.Name: East Chamber

Rooms.Description: In the south chamber of the crypt, the walls are lined with wooden compartments. Each one with a plaque above it to help remember the dead. The main chamber is north, and another room to the south.
Rooms.Name: South Chamber

Rooms.Description: This room serves as a corridor leading to a giant stone door. There is a bronze handle on the door, it looks like it can be opened. The east chamber lies to the west.
Rooms.Name: East Corridor

Rooms.Description: There are many fancy statues and ornaments lining the walls of this room. In the back corner you see a giant sarcophagus that looks very old. Whoever it was built for must have been tall, and important. The eastern corridor lies behind you to the north.
Rooms.Name: Fallen King Tomb

Rooms.Description: Before you lies a large tomb that has been opened. This room is likely the resting place of someone of wealth or importance. The only way out is back north.
Rooms.Name: South Tomb

Rooms.Description: Before you lies a large tomb that has been opened. This room is likely the resting place of someone of wealth or importance. The only way out is back east.
Rooms.Name: West Tomb

Rooms.Description: You leave the crypt.
Rooms.Name: Exit Dungeon

Rooms.Description: You leave the crypt.
Rooms.Name: Exit Dungeon
